categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Opelan was a male Human who was a sergeant in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.

Sergeant Opelan appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Taris Equipment Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock. He was later removed from the game along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Commendations vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
